org.jboss.windup.config.builder

Class RuleProviderBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ocpsoft.rewrite.context.ContextBase
      • org.jboss.windup.config.AbstractRuleProvider
        • org.jboss.windup.config.builder.RuleProviderBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuleProviderBuilderAddDependencies, RuleProviderBuilderMetadataSetPhase, RuleProviderBuilderSetPhase, RuleProvider, org.ocpsoft.common.pattern.Specialized<Object>, org.ocpsoft.common.pattern.Weighted, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.ConfigurationProvider<GraphContext>, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.context.Context

    @Vetoed
public final class RuleProviderBuilder
extends AbstractRuleProvider
implements RuleProviderBuilderSetPhase, RuleProviderBuilderMetadataSetPhase, RuleProviderBuilderAddDependencies
    Used to construct new dynamic AbstractRuleProvider instances.
    Author:
    Jess Sightler, Lincoln Baxter, III
